## func NewFileScanner

```go
func NewFileScanner(filename string) (*bufio.Scanner, func())
```

Create a \`bufio\.Scanner\` from a file name\. Usage:

```
scanner, close := NewFileScanner("p054_poker.txt")

defer close()

for scanner.Scan() {

	line := scanner.Text()

}
```
